#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll ;
int main()
{
	ll arr[21];
	int n,num;
	arr[0]=arr[1]=0;
	for(num=2;num<21;num++)
	{
		arr[num]=arr[num-1]*num;
		if(num%2==0)
			arr[num]++;
		else
			arr[num]--;
	}
	scanf("%d",&n);
	while(n--)
	{
		scanf("%d",&num);
		printf("%lld\n",arr[num]);
	}
	return 0;
}
